title: Close Your Eyes and Let the Mariah Carey Mixed-ish Theme Song Wash Over You
text:
Photo: Samir Hussein/Samir Hussein/WireImage

As summer draws to a close and we all gird ourselves for the onslaught of fall TV premieres, it can be easy to feel overcome with stress at the sheer amount of content we have to consume. Take a moment, sit back, play the highly-anticipated theme song to Mixed-ish sung by Mariah Carey, and forget your troubles. The theme song, “In the Mix,” premiered during ABC’s “Embrace Your Ish” event on Tuesday night. The music video for the song features clips from Mixed-ish, which premieres on September 24. Mixed-ish is a spin-off of ABC’s black-ish, and follows a young Rainbow Johnson (Arica Himmel) as she recounts her experience growing up in a mixed-race family in the ‘80s and the dilemmas they face to acclimate in the suburbs while staying true to themselves. Tracee Ellis Ross, who plays Rainbow Johnson on black-ish, is executive producing. Check out the music video below.
description: The theme song for the new tv show Mixed-ish, sung by Mariah Carey, has premiered. The show is a spin-off of ABC’s black-ish.
